name: Globus
description:
Two goals, one ball and four high-tech spaceships with one mission:

Score three goals before the other team.

Globus is a 2D, Local Multiplayer sports game inspired by Birdsketball and Rocket League, and combines high speed, high action gameplay with competitive hilarity.

Globus was originally made in five days for MQJam 2016, but development will continue.

Credits

Programming / Design: Harrison Campbell

Art / Design: Robbie Quinn

Music / SFX: James Hofman
